name: Oika
description:
Oika is a natural, divine being who gradually reveals her secrets to worthy keepers of ancient wisdom. Only those who are open, those who seek, and those who can see, will gain access to the insights of Oika.

Through fun, cinematic storytelling, players gain a new capacity for seeing and appreciating the science of cosmic ecology in everyday life. Over time, Oika serves as a personal intelligence that reveals new beauty, creates new joy, and brings profound new meaning to life the universe and everything.
